allowance(address,address).details: Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.	     /// This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

params.owner: The account allowed `spender` to withdraw the tokens from the account.
params.spender: The address is approved to withdraw the tokens.

allowance(address,address).return: An amount of spender's token approved by owner.

params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to
The address to delegate votes to
params.expiry: The time at which to expire the signature
params.nonce: The contract state required to match the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

params.delegator: The address to get delegatee for

params.account: The address to get votes balance

getCurrentVotes(address).return: The number of current votes for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).details: Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.

params.account: The address of the account to check
params.blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).return: The number of votes the account had as of the given block

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Throw unless the `sender` account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism. Throw if `sender` or `recipient` is the zero address. Throws if the contract is pausable and paused.	     /// Emits a {Transfer} event. Emits an `Approval` event indicating the updated allowance.

params.amount: The token amount will be transferred.
params.recipient: The owner will receive the tokens.
params.sender: The current owner of the tokens.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: A boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default.

getCurrentVotes(address).notice: Gets the current votes balance for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).notice: Determine the prior number of votes for an account as of a block number

mint(address,uint256).notice: Creates `_amount` token to `_to`. Must only be called by the owner (MasterChef).

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Moves `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using the allowance mechanism. `amount` is then deducted from the caller's allowance.
